bludit-license: Bludit esta publicado bajo la licencia MIT
head-description: Bludit PRO is Bludit with extra remarkable plugins. Bludit PRO doesn't have to be purchased nor requires any special licensing to use it.
description-paragraph1: Bludit PRO is Bludit with extra remarkable plugins. Bludit PRO doesn't have to be purchased nor requires any special licensing to use it.
description-paragraph2: Bludit PRO is available for Backers and Sponsors from Open Collective. Donations and community support are what helps the project stay up and running. Support Bludit via Open Collective today and enjoy all the great features of Bludit plus more with Bludit PRO!
donations-paragraph1: If you like Bludit and is useful for you, you can do a donation to the project. Below, there are some links for differents platforms. Thank you!
paypal-paragraph1: Click on the below link Paypal.me/BluditPRO
paypal-paragraph2: Or send directly to my email account
skrill-paragraph1: Send the donation directly to my email account
bitcoins-paragraph1: You can send the donation to my Bitcoin Wallet Address
